content:
I've done a first pass writeup of how we might consider bulk data handling from the Validated Healthcare Directory for initial comments.
https://confluence.hl7.org/display/PA/Bulk+Data+and+Directories
I'm passing over to the bulk data group for comment too!
If anyone has any comments to add please do, and additional content to add with regards to the subscriptions portion (which is way too thin right now).

@Eric Haas @Daniel Chaput @Eric Heflin @Alex Kontur would appreciate comments from you all if you get a moment to review.
Thanks!
There is also discussion on this happening in the #bulk data stream.

Hi @Brian Postlethwaite thanks for today's call.
Are there any instructions on how to create a confluence account ? https://confluence.hl7.org/display/PA/2019-08-21+Conference+Call
